author: pk910
content:
The correct head votes clearly dropped since electra activation at epoch 256 on mekong.
Aggregates in early electra blocks also look a bit odd:
https://dora.mekong.ethpandaops.io/slot/8201
(almost no attestations for the previous slot, but a lot for earlier slots)

Seems to recover slowly, but looks a bit suspicious.
